raw_body: PIYASENA LABUTALE – (Ex Richard Peiris). Beloved husband of Nelum (retired Teacher),​ son of late Lokubanda and Karaline,​ brother of late Rajha,​ late Anula,​ late Nandasena,​ late Gunasena and Soma,​ brother-in-law of late Susan,​ late Granville,​ late Vasula Gladis,​ late Premadasa,​ Palitha and Malkanthi,​ Malik,​ Aruni and Jayantha,​ expired. Cortege leaves residence No. 20/​1,​ Church Road,​ Wewala,​ Piliyandala for Cremation at Thunbowila,​ Wewala Cemetery at 6 p.m. on Friday,​ 05th January 2024.001160
